p: After 40 days, seedlings were thinned out of each cup, and only one seedling with the best growth was kept, and the remaining seedlings were harvested on the 60th day of continuous growth. The surface soil of harvested seedlings was removed with an SB3200 ultrasonic instrument (Branson Ultrasonics Co., Ltd, Shanghai, China), and the surface water was dried with filter paper. After that, the length and wet biomass of shoots and roots were measured, and their dry biomass was measured after drying at 60 Â°C for 48 h ( Dataset S1).
